channel.title: RegEx on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in RegEx on Datumorphism

item.title: Regular Expression Basics
item.description: List of Keys Anchors at the beginning of line ^ import re p = re.compile('^T', re.I) line = "The email address is this this the do you see" result = p.findall(line) print(result) # ['T'] at the end of the line $ import re p = re.compile('e$', re.I) line = "The email address is this this the do you see" result = p.findall(line) print(result) # ['e'] Character Classes Printable Characters any character . import re p = re.compile('^T.', re.I) line = "The email address is this this the do you see" result = p.findall(line) print(result) # ['Th'] single character of digit \d word character \w (including alphanumeric character and underscore): import re line = "The email address is this this the do you see" result = re.
